How Popular Is WordPress

WordPress has been around for a while now. In this post I'll be talking about some of the main reasons that make WordPress the most popular content management system.

The Most Popular Way of Creating A Website for 15 Years

WordPress has been around since the early 2000's but for the last 15 Years it has been the go to website solutions for the internet.

Almost half of the websites on the internet are powered by WordPress.

Despite the countless options of new website builders WordPress still manages to remain strong in the website solution market holding on to 40% of the market.
